s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 2 FOLD SEAT STOPPER BAND ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Install the stopper band with the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 3 SEAT OUTER REAR LEG SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the leg with the 2 plates and bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 3 SEAT OUTER FRONT LEG SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the leg with the 2 plates and bolt.
Install the plate with the 2 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT CUSHION COVER

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, install the seat cushion cover to the seat cushion pad with 6 new hog rings.
Using hog ring pliers, install the seat cushion cover (with pad) to the seat cushion frame with 8 new hog rings.
Close the zippers and attach the 2 hooks.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 2 SEAT LEG SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the leg with the 2 bolts.
Using a screwdriver, install the No. 3 seat cushion spring.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT LAP TYPE CENTER BELT ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Pass the belt through the hole in the seat cushion cover (with pad).

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Pass the belt through the hole in the seat cushion cover (with pad). Install the inner belt and lap type belt to the No. 2 seat cushion frame with the nut.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 3 SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Install the hinge cover with the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER

s2.ptxt: Install the hinge cover with the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT LEG COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Pass the release band through the hole in the leg cover. Then install the lock cover with the 3 screws.
Fold the release band as shown in the illustration. Then install the 2 lock release buttons.
Attach the 2 claws to install the hinge cover.
Install the 2 clips and 2 screws.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, install the seatback cover to the seatback pad with 3 new hog rings.
Install the seatback cover (with pad) to the seatback frame.
Attach the 4 claws to install the 2 headrest supports.
Attach the hooks and close the fastening tape.
for RH Side:
Install the seatback with the 2 bolts.
for LH Side:
Install the seatback, spacer and plate with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT CUSHION HINGE LOWER COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Install the lower cover with the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT RECLINING COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Install the reclining cover with the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 1 RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE RH

s2.ptxt: Install the release handle with the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT HEADREST ASSEMBLY
